page.title: 19CHURCH FARM.
page.content: {Mr.& Mrs. Smith}own{Church Farm}which is next door to{BroadTown}School.They have been there 21 years on the 4 July 1985.They have got 23 acres at Church Farm, 37 at Marston Farm and 35 from Brasenose College.They have 600 beef calves they sell 500 at 12-14 weeks.Their farm is all for hay and silage.Their breakfast room was the original dairy.The kitchen was a stable and the bathroom was a cheese room.The old part of their house was built in the late 18th century.The newer part of the house was built in{ {1901. } Mr.Brian Smith...their son also works on the farm.He is having a house built for his wife and family on the field just past the school.
